Text: Reseeding now, this took many weeks for the swarm to get to full speed initially, and it may take a while to even get a full copy in the swarm. Help this LARGE seed out by seeding for awhile after finishing download! Thanks Everyone!
I can't get any audio out of this one, but part 2 is fine.  Gspot says I have the correct audio codec installed.  Any ideas?
Just about the only thing I can imagine is something got corrupted in your download, I might have a workaround for you, lemme check on it, shoot me an email when you read this.

Damn, I have the exact problem... No audio on part one.... Now I KNOW its my pc, coz I have another pc that plays it with audio... so, what codecs are you guys using please? Im using the CCCP which should in theory handl;e this with no problem
I have audio, but it;s only 2 channel... it 'says' it is 5.1, but only 2 of the channels work.
Btw the audio problem a few of us had was caused by not having the correct audio filters activated.
